backFields.label: About This Event
backFields.value:
Join us for Impact Summit 2025 — a groundbreaking conference exploring regenerative capital frameworks and sustainable community investment.

This two-day event features:
• Keynote speakers from leading impact investors
• Interactive workshops on regenerative finance
• Networking with Early Adopters and community leaders
• Live demonstrations of the LIFT Certificate framework

Exclusive to LIFT Certificate Early Adopters (Series 2025Q4).

backFields.label: Event Schedule
backFields.value:
Friday, Nov 15:
6:00 PM - Doors Open & Registration
6:30 PM - Welcome Reception
7:00 PM - Opening Keynote
8:30 PM - Networking Session

Saturday, Nov 16:
9:00 AM - Morning Workshops
12:00 PM - Lunch & Panel Discussion
2:00 PM - Afternoon Sessions
5:00 PM - Closing Ceremony

backFields.label: VIP Access Information
backFields.value:
As a VIP Early Adopter, you have access to:

• VIP Lounge (Code: VIP2025)
• Priority seating in Section A
• Exclusive meet-and-greet with speakers
• Complimentary refreshments
• Early access to workshop materials

VIP Lounge is located on the second floor, Room 201.

backFields.label: Venue Information
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
123 Historic District
Frederick, Maryland 21701

Parking: Free parking available in the adjacent lot (enter from Market Street)

Public Transit: Downtown Shuttle stops directly in front of the venue

Accessibility: Wheelchair accessible via main entrance. Please contact us for special accommodations.

backFields.label: Contact & Support
backFields.value:
Event Organizer: LocalFund
Phone: +1 (949) 202-6850
Email: events@exchangereserve.org

For event-day assistance, text 'HELP' to the number above.

Website: https://exchangereserve.org/summit2025

backFields.label: Your LIFT Certificate
backFields.value:
This pass is tied to your LIFT Certificate (Serial: LIFT-2025-iOS18-DEMO).

Your certificate represents participation in Exchange Reserve's regenerative capital framework and grants you access to exclusive Impact Summit events.

Verify your certificate: https://exchangereserve.org/verify/LIFT-2025-iOS18-DEMO
